initial_expr: ∀ (input : List Int) (state : LISState input) (h_sorted : PilesSorted state.piles) (h : state.processed < input.length) (p : Nat) (hp : p < state.piles.size), (processElement input state h).piles[p]! ≤ state.piles[p]!

proof_steps.tactic: intro input state h_sorted h p hp

tactic_history: intro input state h_sorted h p hp

goals.target:
(if h_1 : binarySearchGE state.piles input[state.processed] < state.piles.size then
        { processed := state.processed + 1,
          piles := state.piles.set (binarySearchGE state.piles input[state.processed]) input[state.processed] ⋯,
          predecessors :=
            state.predecessors.push
              (if binarySearchGE state.piles input[state.processed] > 0 then
                ↑state.pileIndices[binarySearchGE state.piles input[state.processed] - 1]!
              else -1),
          pileIndices := state.pileIndices.set (binarySearchGE state.piles input[state.processed]) state.processed ⋯,
          h_processed := ⋯, h_piles_size := ⋯, h_pred_size := ⋯ }
      else
        { processed := state.processed + 1, piles := state.piles.push input[state.processed],
          predecessors :=
            state.predecessors.push
              (if binarySearchGE state.piles input[state.processed] > 0 then
                ↑state.pileIndices[binarySearchGE state.piles input[state.processed] - 1]!
              else -1),
          pileIndices := state.pileIndices.push state.processed, h_processed := ⋯, h_piles_size := ⋯,
          h_pred_size := ⋯ }).piles[p]! ≤
  state.piles[p]!
